faqs.question: Which monitoring tools are supported?
faqs.answer: Any monitoring tool that can send email alerts is supported. This includes Nagios, Zabbix, PRTG, Prometheus AlertManager, Datadog, New Relic, and custom scripts.

faqs.question: Can I filter which alerts get sent as SMS?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can set up keyword filters to only forward critical alerts. For example, only forward emails containing 'CRITICAL' or 'DOWN' in the subject.

faqs.question: How fast are alerts delivered?
faqs.answer: SMS alerts are typically delivered within 3-5 seconds of receiving the email alert from your monitoring tool.

faqs.question: Can multiple team members receive the same alert?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can add multiple phone numbers to receive the same alerts, or set up different email addresses for different team members.
